title: Asian Stocks Advance at Open, Gold Tops $4,500: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks rose at the open after Wall Street shares rallied to a record after data showed the US economy grew at its fastest pace in two years.
content: Asian stocks rose at the open after Wall Street shares rallied to a record after data showed the US economy grew at its fastest pace in two years.
